name: Unusago
description:
Unusago is our game we've developed for the Gamemaker's Toolkit Game Jam 2019. According to the theme of the jam "Only one" we've created a little game that consists of:  one world, one archer, one arrow.

You are alone, you are trapped in one world, and you only have one arrow, that you can shoot. However, once it drops to the ground you have to collect it again. Waves of fierce enemies await you and your only objective is too stay alive. 

Unusago is Esperanto and means "One arrow". 

Controls:
Left Click (Mouse): Shoot, Collect
A: Left
D: Right
SPACE: Jump
TAB: Switch Camera
